about_the_game:
A single colony ship sails amongst the stars, its people desperate and courageous. Somewhere in the galaxy waits their new home. But the galaxy is a big and dangerous place. This isn't going to work on the first attempt...

In Scrapchasers, players travel the stars in search of a new star to call home, but they will need more than just their wits to succeed. They will need tenacity, struggling against overwhelming odds to obtain the means for their survival. Ships can be lost, but no attempt is in vain, as the massive colony ship continues its journey undeterred.

Gameplay features in Scrapchasers include:

  • Build your ship from scraps with deckbuilding logic
  • Defeat enemy ships to obtain new parts and resources
  • Upgrade your colony ship between runs for persistent powers
  • Initiate interstellar travel to generate new star systems to explore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A rogue-lite dice game in space! Build your ship as you explore randomly generated star systems, survive hostile encounters, and upgrade your colony ship for the next generation of chasers. Can you find a new home for your orphaned race amongst the stars?
